title: Noatak National Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Caribou Hunting Closed to Non-Federally Qualified Users  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Caribou Hunting Closed to Non-Federally Qualified Users  Caribou hunting in Noatak Naitonal Preserve is closed to non-federally qualified users starting on July 1, 2016. more
